title: And Just Like That.....We Mourn and Talk S***t
itunes:title: And Just Like That.....We Mourn and Talk S***t
itunes:subtitle: A Review of the EXPLOSIVE Intro of the Sex and The City Reboot
description:
Mads and Aleena had to drop an "emergency" episode this week to hash out everything surrounding the "And Just Like That..." premiere, where we dissect some of the major themes being brought up in the season (thus far), discuss the explosive turn of events that led to Peloton's stock crashing, and fan girl over Sarah Jessica Parkers impeccable and iconic fashion choices. Do we think Kim Cattrall would ever come back? Will Charlotte's character be exposed to further difficulties with identity and motherhood? Come join us as we talk sh** together, mourn together, laugh together, and so much more!



Don't forget to follow us, review our podcast and subscribe on our socials!

  • Twitter: @BasicandBrain
  • Instagram: @TheBasicandTheBrain
  • TikTok: @thebasic_and_thebrain
  • Website: thebasicandthebrain.com



Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
